data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nimes just outside Marseille's area.
In the minute 1, Jordan Amavi (Marseille) gets a yellow card.
Renaud Ripart for Nimes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Marseille have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Marseille in the half of Nimes.
Willy Delajod signals a Marseille throw-in in Nimes's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Marseille at Stade des Costieres.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
Renaud Ripart (Nimes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Nimes.
In the minute 13, Marseille drives forward and Dimitri Payet gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Jordan Amavi (Marseille) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Duje Caleta Car (Marseille) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Willy Delajod awards Nimes a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Nimes.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Nimes are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 17, Niclas Eliasson (Nimes) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 18, In Nimes, Dario Benedetto of Marseille is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nimes.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Mickael Cuisance (Marseille) has received a first yellow card.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, Willy Delajod signals a throw-in for Marseille, close to Nimes's area.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 24, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
Marseille push upfield but Willy Delajod quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Marseille's Mickael Cuisance misses with an attempt on goal.
Willy Delajod awards Nimes a goal kick.
In the minute 28, In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Dario Benedetto of Marseille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Nimes.
Marseille have a dangerous throw-in.
Boubacar Kamara (Marseille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 37, Marseille drive upfield and Boubacar Kamara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nimes defender.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 40, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nimes.
Duje Caleta Car (Marseille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a Marseille throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Free kick Marseille.
Nimes's Loick Landre has been booked in Nimes.
In the minute 44, Alvaro Gonzalez (Marseille) has received a yellow card from Willy Delajod.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 45, Nimes needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
The first half has been concluded at Stade des Costieres.
The second-half is underway at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 46, Marseille's Dario Benedetto has run offside.
Nimes are pushing forward but Renaud Ripart's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
In the minute 49, At Stade des Costieres, Nimes are penalized for being offside.
Marseille's Dario Benedetto goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Dario Benedetto for Marseille is whistled offside.
Throw-in Nimes.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
The match at Stade des Costieres has been interrupted briefly for a check on Renaud Ripart, who is down injured.
In the minute 55, Renaud Ripart is back on the pitch.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 57, Dario Benedetto scores to make it 0-1 at Stade des Costieres.
Great play from Alvaro Gonzalez to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Marseille at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 60, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 61, Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
Jerome Arpinon (Nimes) is making a first substitution, with Lamine Fomba replacing Matteo Ahlinvi.
Moussa Kone is replacing Haris Duljevic for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Marseille.
In Nimes, Moussa Kone (Nimes) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 64, Marseille have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Nimes!
Nimes's Patrick Burner gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
Nimes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 69, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
The away team have replaced Mickael Cuisance with Pape Alassane Gueye. This is the first substitution made today by Andre Villas-Boas.
In the minute 70, Nimes's Zinedine Ferhat breaks free at Stade des Costieres. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Andre Villas-Boas is making the team's second substitution at Stade des Costieres with Florian Thauvin replacing Dimitri Payet.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 71, Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a third substitution, with Valere Germain replacing Dario Benedetto.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 72, Free kick Marseille.
Willy Delajod signals a Nimes throw-in in Marseille's half.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 74, Andres Cubas is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Nimes in the half of Marseille.
Can Marseille capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Andres Cubas in Nimes has been yellow-carded a second time by Willy Delajod and is being sent off.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Marseille's Morgan Sanson misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
In the minute 83, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Marseille extend their lead to 0-2 through Valere Germain.
Morgan Sanson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 87, Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kevin Strootman is replacing Boubacar Kamara for Marseille at Stade des Costieres.
The away team have replaced Valentin Rongier with Luis Henrique. This is the fifth substitution made today by Andre Villas-Boas.
In the minute 88, Nimes to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marseille's Luis Henrique is whistled for offside at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Marseille in Nimes.
Willy Delajod awards Nimes a goal kick.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Florian Thauvin for Marseille drives towards goal at Stade des Costieres. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Nimes make their third substitution with Nolan Roux replacing Niclas Eliasson.
Sofiane Alakouch is replacing Gaetan Paquiez for the home team.
